item.description:
What does the REAL Christmas Story have to do with Advanced Energy Healing?

And what does Advanced Energy Healing have to do with
REGENERATING OUR ORIGINAL
ORGANIC DNA TEMPLATE?


The same group who preserved the COMPLETE records of Jesus' birth, also preserved the details about the REAL purpose for which He came.

He was MUCH MORE than currently believed.

He was called "Jeshua 12" and in addition to what has remained in current scriptures...

He also taught Keylontic Science self-help energy healing techniques, as necessary to regenerate our original DNA template encoding to restore our natural ascension capabilities.

The "12" in Jeshua 12 refers to the number of DNA strands he had functioning in their original organic sequence.

DNA template encoding includes much more than what is commonly believed.

The base genetic alphabet has 144 letters, not the 4 which remain now. The rest have been energetically scrambled by dark forces who do NOT have the best interest of humanity at heart.

Included in with the original organic DNA encryption are codes defining embodiments we have on other spiritual planes, as well as keys to unlock known ascension gates.

Although the organizer of this group has a strong interest in the health and wellness advantages of regenerating our natural organic DNA encoding...

It is also important to understand that doing so has everything to do with
SPIRITUALITY AND ASCENSION


And on top of that...

Certain Keylontic Science shielding techniques are essential to protect against devistating energetic changes known for eons to be arriving here by Dec 21, 2012.

Since all other records have had major portions deleted...

With remaining portions containing deliberate distortions designed to perpetuate control dogmas...

We can now understand why the original records needed to be hidden and cloistered so they could be brought back now... when we really need to know the truth!

These records were preserved by the Melchizedek Cloister Emerald Order (MCEO), described on this link:

http://www.azuritepre...

To view a description of "The Real Christmas Story" which will be played and discussed this time, click on the link below:

http://www.azuritepre...

At this time of the year, you will be able to view a reference to this, and a celebration called "Festival of Lights" on the publisher's home page:

www.azuritepress.com.



This Meetup adjourns at 9:00 PM. Please bring your own refreshments.

In case of snow, this will be rescheduled, so be sure to check back on this site for an update before coming.

DIRECTIONS: Get on I-93 from wherever you are. We are approx. half an hour north of Concord, NH.

Get off on exit 22. At the end of the ramp go North on Rt. 127 (toward Gaza). In approx. 1.5 miles you will come to a stop sign.

Turn left, going North on Rt 132. Watch for mailbox number 298 on the right side of the road, approx. 1.5 mi. up. A tan building with semi-circular window is across the street, on the left side.

Go up the first driveway into the property, which has a Meetup sign at the end. Do NOT go up the second driveway which has a sign "ULCS Clinic". No parking is allowed there, so if you get that far, turn around in that driveway and go back and up the first driveway.

Enter through the front door, where you will see another Meetup sign. No need to knock. Just go on in and down the stairs and have a seat in the classroom. If you are arriving early for a private appointment, have a seat in the waiting room instead.

..
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup sign at end of first driveway and on front door. No need to knock. Meeting is in downstairs classroom.
item.name: The REAL Christmas Story and Jeshua's DNA Template
